name: Mantis Knight
skills: Acrobatics +7, Deception +4, Nature +3, Persuasion +4, Perception +6, Stealth +7, Survival +4

traits.name: Sunbeetle Armor
traits.desc: The Knight’s armor is perpetually slick. Any attempts to grapple the Knight have disadvantage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Magic cannot put the Knight to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Knight has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Command Fey
traits.desc: As a member of the Court of Arcadia, the Knight can cast dominate monster (DC 12) at will on any fey creature or elf.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The Knight’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The Knight can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: heroism, shield of faith

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Knight makes four attacks with its rapiers, or makes two attacks and casts heroism or shield of faith on an ally.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
